summary: In 1890s London, two friends use the same pseudonym ("Ernest") for their on-the-sly activities. Hilarity ensues.
cast: Rupert Everett|Colin Firth|Frances O'Connor|Reese Witherspoon|Judi Dench|Tom Wilkinson|Anna Massey|Edward Fox|Patrick Godfrey|Charles Kay|Cyril Shaps|Marsha Fitzalan|Finty Williams|Guy Bensley|Christina Robert|Kiera Chaplin|Alexandra Kobi|Suzie Boyle|Kate Coyne|Bernadette Iglich|Polli Redston|Elaine Tyler-Hall|Gillian Winn|Holly Collins|Kit Dickinson|Suzanne Thomas|Charlie Mole|Darrell Kok|Judd Procter|Martin Knowles|Greg Bennett|Sacha Bennett|Ray Donn|Sonja Morgenstern|Louise Rhian Poole
title: La importancia de llamarse Ernesto
